description: Try our easy to follow Indian Pumpkin & Chickpea Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Indian Pumpkin & Chickpea Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add pumpkin, tomato and coconut milk. Bring to a simmer and cook, partially covered, for 20 minutes, then add chickpeas. Simmer for a further 12 minutes or until pumpkin is tender. Stir in chopped coriander. Serve with rice, and topped with remaining coriander and chilli.
